name: pink tweed lapel flower
description:
In nature, flowers are very similar, yet they hold individual characteristics. The same is true with the Carraway Concept lapel flowers. Each flower is hand crafted nearly 40 years of experience, using only the best quality fabrics. This item is made to order, so please make the appropriate accommodations when ordering.
 
If you need a larger quantity of this item please let us know.  

Please read our shipping policy.

If you have any questions please email us at hello@thecarrawayconcept.com 

Our lapel flowers are proudly handcrafted in the South, of the USA.

name: sinclair lapel flower
description:
In nature, flowers are very similar yet they hold individual characteristics. The same is true with the Rashon Carraway signature lapel flowers.

Each flower is cut and assembled by hand to ensure a unique appearance. Each flower measures approximately 2-2.5 inches in width and 3 inches long with hardware.
Only the best fabrics are used to produce these high quality lapel flowers.

name: Choose your color
description:
MORE ITEMS are LISTED on www.thecarrawayconcept.com


In nature flowers are very similar yet they hold their own characteristics. The same is true with these Rashon Carraway signature flower lapel pins.

Each flower is cut and assembled by hand and measures approximately 2-2.5 inches in width and the hardware it measures approximately 3 inches long. Each lapel flower is made from 100% cotton. 

Please allow 2-3 business days before shipping as each pin is made to order. If there is a longer wait time or back order, you will be notified.

name: Custom Lapel Flowers
description:
In nature flowers are very similar yet they hold their own characteristics. The same is true with m signature lapel pins.

Each flower is cut and assembled by hand and measures approximately 2-2.5 inches in width and with the hardware it measures approximately 3 inches long.

When placing your custom order, please note that combinations that are not readily accessible in a fabric option may take longer to source. Please allow "at least 7 days" for sourcing and production of your lapel pins, BEFORE it ships. This is the maximum allotted time and in some cases it may ship quicker.

Custom lapel pins that are needed in a shorter amount of time can be selected through the RUSH option. 

For next day or overnight shipping, orders must be placed BEFORE noon EST.

If there are any additional questions please ask them.
